Concept.title: {=!}Blood Kiss
Concept.text: The Blood Kiss is a mechanic that allows human characters to be turned into a {TOR_VAMPIRE}, bringing with it all the benefits and detriments of the transformation.{newline} {newline}To receive the Blood Kiss you must join a Vampire faction and once you reach Clan Level 4 speak to its faction leader - Walach Harkon for Blood Knights or Mannfred von Carstein for Vampire Nobility.

{=!}Necromancy
Concept.text: Necromancy provides a custom feature for certain careers and races - the ability to raise the dead. Having access to these magics means that you will have the option to raise the dead after battles to bolster your armies, as well as visit specific locations (like {TOR_CURSEDLOCATIONS}) on the campaign map to recruit higher-tier undead units such as wraiths (see {TOR_RAISEDEAD}).{newline}

Concept.title: {=!}Spell Book
{=!}Spell Selection
Concept.text: By clicking on the spells inside the {TOR_SPELLBOOK} you select them as combat spells, which will be usable the next time you enter a battle. All other spells will not be visible during the fight. If no spells are selected then all spells will be available to cast.{newline}

Concept.title: {=!}Magic and Holy Items
Concept.text: Usually with a purple background, magic items come with a special effect, which can be read by hovering over the blue icon at the bottom of their tooltip. Those magic items often amplify the wearer’s magical abilities or offer additional protection. The player can acquire them by visiting vendors around the Old World or winning battles against the owners of such items.{newline}
